pr_title: Restore third party copyright headers in context package.

timeline.message: Restore third party copyright headers in context package.

timeline.author: Oberon00

replies.bodyText: What will be the criterium for "mostly"? When should we use one variant or another?
replies.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: Yeah I think it's a bit hard to judge, and we may modify the file later. In my experience, I've seen dual-license generally applied to files that are completely copied, not sure but probably for these reasons. The package name is different so I deserve some credit for that? Or does Jetbrains? XD
replies.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: I think just keeping the "Includes work from" is a good all-encompassing bit of verbiage.
replies.author: jkwatson
